[[שָׂדִי]] Je 32:7, Je 32:8, [[שָֽׂדְךָ]] De 11:15 +, [[שָׂדֶָךָ]] De 24:19, Le 25:3, etc.; pl. [[שָׂדוֹת]] 1Sa 22:7 +, cstr. [[שְׂדוֹת]] Ne 12:29; also [[שְׂדֵי]] 2Sa 1:21, Is 32:12, Ru 1:1 + 8 t. [[שְׂדׂתֶיהָ]] Ne 11:30, etc.; also [[שָׂדֶיךָ]] 1Ki 2:26, [[שָׂדֵינוּ]] Mic 2:4;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: pasture-land Ge 29:2, Ge 30:16, Ex 9:3 (all J), De 11:15, 1Sa 11:5 + 10 t. J, JE.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: unfrequented Ge 24:63, Ge 24:65, exposed to violence Ge 4:8 (J), 2Sa 14:6, De 21:1, De 22:25, De 22:27, to wild beasts Ex 22:30 (E), Ez Eze 33:27.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: specif. home of beasts: 2Sa 17:8, Je 14:5; esp. phr. ´[[חַיַּת הַשּׂ]]: Ge 2:19, Ge 2:20, Ge 3:1, Ge 3:14 (all J) of beasts in gen., and, of wild beasts, Ex 23:11, Ex 23:29 (E), Ho 2:14, Ho 2:20, Ho 4:3, Ho 13:8, De 7:22, Le 26:22 (H), Job 5:23 (‖[[חַיַּת הָאָרֶץ ]]), + 16 t.; ´[[בֶּהֱמַת הַשּׂ]]: 1Sa 17:44 cf. Joe 1:20; ´[[אַיְלוֹת הַשּׂ]]: Ct So 2:7, So 3:5, cf. ´[[הַצְּבָיִם אֲשֶׁר בַּשּׂ]]: 2Sa 2:18; hunting-ground Ge 25:29, Ge 27:3, Ge 27:5 (all JE), cf. ´[[אִישׁ שׂ]]: Ge 25:27 (JE; ‖[[אִישׁ יׂדֵעַ חַיִד ]]).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: open country, outside of walled city Ju Jdg 9:32, Jdg 9:42, Jdg 9:43, Jdg 9:44, Jdg 19:16, 1Sa 19:3, 1Sa 20:5, 1Sa 20:11, 1Sa 20:11, 1Sa 20:24, 1Sa 20:35, 2Ki 7:12, Mic 4:10; as battle-ground Jos 8:24 (J), 2Sa 10:8 = 1Ch 19:9, 2Sa 11:23, 2Sa 18:6, outside of military camp 1Sa 4:2, 1Sa 14:15; opp. city (in formula) 1Ki 14:11, 1Ki 16:4, 1Ki 21:24, Je 14:18, Ez Eze 7:15; [[שְׂדֵה אֶרֶץ]] Le 25:31; as site of small town, country-town 1Sa 27:5 (opp. royal city), cf. 1Ch 27:25; of high places, ´[[גְּבָעוֹת בַּשּׂ]]: Je 13:27; quite gen., 1Sa 30:11, Je 40:7, Je 40:13; including road Ju Jdg 20:31, 1Ki 11:29, Je 6:25; disting. from road Nu 22:23 (JE), 2Sa 20:12; outside houses and courtyards Ex 8:9 (P), 1Sa 25:15; ´[[בַּשּׂ]]: nearly = outdoors Ex 1:14 (P), Ju Jdg 13:9; of surface of country or ground, ´[[בַּשּׂ]]: Ex 16:25 (JE; = [[עַל־פְּנֵי הַמִּדְבָּר]] v:Ex 16:14), cf. 1Sa 14:25; so ´[[לְַ־פְּנֵי הַשּׂ]] :([[אֶל]]) 2Ki 9:37, Je 9:22, Ez Eze 29:5 (‖[[הַמִּדְבָּ֫רָה ]]), Eze 32:4, Eze 39:5; same phr. opp. house, comfort, etc., 2Sa 11:11, Ez Eze 16:5, opp. city Le 14:7, Le 14:53, opp. tent Nu 19:16 (all P), opp. tent of meeting Le 17:5 (H).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: = expanse of country, opp. mt., in phr. ´[[מְרוֹמֵי שׂ]]: Ju Jdg 5:18; ´[[הֲרָרִי בַּשּׂ]]: Je 17:3 (of Jerus.) is dub.; cf. ´[[לְעִי הַשּׂ]]: Mic 1:6 (Je 18:14 v. [[שָׂדַי]]).
definite portion of ground, field, land:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: cultivated ground Ge 37:7 (E), Ge 47:24 (J; [[זֶרַע הַשָּׂדֶה]]), Ex 22:4, Ex 22:4, Ex 22:4, Ex 22:5 (E), Le 27:16, Le 27:17 (P), Mic 3:12 (in sim.) Ru 2:2 + 47 t., + [[תְרוּמוֹת]] 2Sa 1:21, [[־זָ֑רַע]]´[[שׂ]]: Ez Eze 17:5, [[שָׂדֶה מוֹב]] v:Eze 17:8 good soil.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as private property, Mic 5:2, Mic 5:4, Is 5:8, Is 5:8, Ge 47:20 (J), Ge 23:9, Ge 23:11, Ge 23:13 (P) + 50 t., + 2Ch 26:23 (as burial-place); also ´[[שּׂ]]:([[הַ]])[[חֶלְקַת ]], v. [[חֶלְקָה]]; and [[חׂפִים]] ´[[שׂ]]:, v. [[חפה]].

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: city-land, adjacent to city (town) and subject to its control: Ge 41:48 (E), Le 25:34 (P), Jos 21:12 (P) = 1Ch 6:41, Ne 11:25, Ne 11:30, Ne 12:29, Ne 12:44; specif. of Zoan Ps 78:12, Ps 78:43.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: territory of nation, tribe: Ge 32:4, Nu 21:20 (both JE), Ju Jdg 5:4, Ru 1:1, Ru 1:2, Ge 14:7 + 13 t. + ´[[שְׂדֵה נִחֲלַת יִשׂ]]: Ju Jdg 20:6.
land, opp. sea, 1Ch 16:32 (opp. [[הַיׇּם]]; = [[שָׂדַי]] Ps 96:12), perhaps also mainland Ez Eze 26:6, Eze 26:8 (Co Krae Toy al.; not Sm).
